summary: Set in Paris during the 1960s, a group of stylish teenagers hang out at a club called the Drugstore.
cast: Mathieu Simonet|Cécile Cassel|Aurélien Wiik|Alice Taglioni|Matthias Van Khache|Laurent Pialet|Anne Abel|Marion Armanet|Alban Aumard|Alain Bashung|Bayon|Fabien Billet|Thomas Blanchard|Olivier Brun|Inès de Beauregard|Mimi de Montmartre|Julien Delettre|Romain Deroo|Pauline Devinol|Lucien Gainsbourg|Romain Goupil|Deborah Helpert|Jean Helpert|Carole Jacquinot|Jacky Jakubowicz|Xavier Lafitte|Jacques Lanzmann|Gabrielle Lazure|Clémence Lenorman|Thierry Lhermitte|Stéphane Medez|Alexis Michalik|Mélanie Page|Paul Périer|Marie Ravel|Romain Rondeau|John Henry Westhead
title: La bande du drugstore
